:contextual-unwrap-note.label: t__Unwrap note
:contextual-unwrap-note.description: t__Remove the note but preserve its content.

:insert-note.label: t__Note
:insert-note.description: t__Contains information that expands on or calls attention to a particular point. This information is typically differentiated from the main text.

:insert-note[@type=attention].label: t__Attention note
:insert-note[@type=attention].description: t__Please pay extra attention to this note.

:insert-note[@type=danger].label: t__Danger note
:insert-note[@type=danger].description: t__Important! Be aware of this before doing anything else.

:insert-note[@type=fastpath].label: t__Fastpath note
:insert-note[@type=fastpath].description: t__This note will speed you on your way.

:insert-note[@type=notice].label: t__Notice note
:insert-note[@type=notice].description: t__Indicates a potential situation which, if not avoided, might result in an undesirable result or state.

:insert-note[@type=other].label: t__Other note
:insert-note[@type=other].description: t__This is something other than a normal note.

:insert-note[@type=remember].label: t__Remember note
:insert-note[@type=remember].description: t__Don't forget to do what this note says.

:insert-note[@type=restriction].label: t__Restriction note
:insert-note[@type=restriction].description: t__You can't do what this note says.

:insert-note[@type=tip].label: t__Tip note
:insert-note[@type=tip].description: t__This is a fine little tip.

data.selectionAncestorNodeSpec: self::*[fonto:dita-class(., 'topic/div') or fonto:dita-class(., 'topic/abstract') or fonto:dita-class(., 'topic/body') or fonto:dita-class(., 'topic/bodydiv') or fonto:dita-class(., 'topic/dd') or fonto:dita-class(., 'topic/desc') or fonto:dita-class(., 'topic/draft-comment') or fonto:dita-class(., 'topic/entry') or fonto:dita-class(., 'topic/example') or fonto:dita-class(., 'topic/fig') or fonto:dita-class(., 'topic/figgroup') or fonto:dita-class(., 'topic/fn') or fonto:dita-class(., 'topic/itemgroup') or fonto:dita-class(., 'topic/li') or fonto:dita-class(., 'topic/linkinfo') or fonto:dita-class(., 'topic/lq') or fonto:dita-class(., 'topic/section') or fonto:dita-class(., 'topic/sectiondiv') or fonto:dita-class(., 'topic/stentry')]

:note-convert-to-@type=null.label: t__Change to standard note
:note-convert-to-@type=null.description: t__Change this note to a standard note.

:note-convert-to-@type=attention.label: t__Change to attention note
:note-convert-to-@type=attention.description: t__Change this note to a attention note.

:note-convert-to-@type=fastpath.description: t__Change this note to a fastpath note.

:note-convert-to-@type=important.description: t__Change this note to an important note.

:note-convert-to-@type=notice.label: t__Change to notice note
:note-convert-to-@type=notice.description: t__Change this note to a notice note.

:note-convert-to-@type=other.label: t__Change to other note
:note-convert-to-@type=other.description: t__Change this note to an other note.

:note-convert-to-@type=remember.label: t__Change to remember note
:note-convert-to-@type=remember.description: t__Change this note to a remember note.

:note-convert-to-@type=restriction.description: t__Change this note to a restriction note.
